main event: Two observers reported sightings of unusual flying objects in Lockport, New York on 27 July 1952.
interesting points: The first sighting was a round, white glowing object observed for approximately 3 seconds at an altitude of 5,000 feet., The first observer was located 225 feet from the object., The second sighting was of a triangular object described as a 'ball of fire' that maneuvered erratically and quickly gained altitude., The second observer had a private pilot's license., Both reports came from qualified observers within the Ground Observer Corps.
sighted object: a round white glowing light and a triangular bright object
witness description: qualified observers of the Ground Observer Corps
